name: Pioneer Park
address: Red Hills Pkwy, St. George, UT 84770
description: A scenic city park with sandstone formations, hiking, and picnic areas.

name: St. George Temple
description: A historic temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, known for its striking white exterior.

name: Snow Canyon State Park
description: A state park with red rock canyons, lava tubes, and scenic trails.

name: Tuacahn Amphitheatre
description: An outdoor amphitheater set in red rock, hosting Broadway-style shows.

name: Red Hills Desert Garden
address: 375 E Red Hills Pkwy, St. George, UT 84770
description: A free public garden showcasing desert plants and a stream with native fish.

name: Brigham Young Winter Home
description: Historic home of Brigham Young, open for tours and historical insights.

name: Dinosaur Discovery Site
address: 2180 E Riverside Dr, St. George, UT 84790
description: Museum built around preserved dinosaur tracks with interactive exhibits.

name: Historic Downtown St. George
description: Shops, restaurants, murals, and galleries in the charming historic downtown district.
